committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act with respect to the use of forfeited real property as public areas reserved for recreational or historic purposes or for the preservation of natural conditions.
short_title: Controlled Substances and Forfeited Property Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Controlled Substances and Forfeited Property Amendments of 1991 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to permit the transfer to States of forfeited real property for use as public areas for recreational or historic purposes or for the preservation of natural conditions.

titles.title: Controlled Substances and Forfeited Property Amendments of 1991
To amend the Controlled Substances Act with respect to the use of forfeited real property as public areas reserved for recreational or historic purposes or for the preservation of natural conditions.
